generated_body: In the article titled "Taylor Swift Rep Hits Back at Big Machine, Claims She's Actually Owed $7.9 Million in Unpaid Royalties," the user can expect a detailed account of the ongoing dispute between Taylor Swift and her former record label, Big Machine Records. The piece is likely to outline the nature of the royalty claims, providing insights into the financial implications for Swift and the broader context of artist-label relationships in the music industry. Additionally, it may discuss the reactions from both Swift's representatives and Big Machine, highlighting the complexities of the legal and financial issues involved in this case.
